alert.note: Alert for Big Horn; Carbon; Stillwater; Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:02PM MDT until September 07 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Stillwater County in south central Montana... West central Big Horn County in south central Montana... North central Carbon County in south central Montana... Southwestern Yellowstone County in south central Montana... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 401 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Joliet, or 16 miles southeast of Columbus, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Laurel, Joliet, Fromberg, Pryor, Billings West End, Edgar, Boyd, Roberts, Silesia, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Park City and Rockvale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
